Method Summary
 void changed(Stage previous, Stage current)
          Signal a change in the current stage, either of internal data or a switching from previous stage to current.

          Signal that the application is about to quit, indicating that any resource should be cleanly released.

          Signal a save request for the stage.

saving

void saving(Stage stage,
            java.util.Properties properties)
Signal a save request for the stage. Components can store their persistent properties in the passing object, which will be synchronized and saved.
